item.title: Mobilink Infinity :: Second Review
item.description: I’ve been using Mobilink Infinity Wimax service for the last 20 days or so , and wanted to share some numbers / graphs with users. I’ve been plotting it 24/7 by SNMP . The overall usage experience is okay now, the service works most of the times ( apart from the weird timeouts that i start getting sometimes ). The only thing we need from Mobilink Infinity team now , is to
